comment.author: 23456839@N07
comment._content: This is a v. poignant photo - as it is just a couple of years since the end of World War 2 and these boys are without families, makes you wonder how many were made fatherless and/or war widows (& others) had to leave them at a Boys' Home due to the inevitable hardship experienced at the time. Even though I was born in 1946, my elder siblings could easily have ended up here, I well remember being taught (& realising) how lucky we were our Dad 'came home' after service. Can't help hoping these boys coped & reached adulthood in peacetime Sydney. Thank you for submitting this photograph, specially at this time of year (Christmas 2010)
